Here we'll classify network-level properties, and then do  a study of replicators and parasites. 



```{r}
source("vg_plus_rprops_functions.R")
fn <- "~/Desktop/paulien/smsp/1705smsp/out5/out1_1000000.conf"
ur<-pairwise.properties(fn)
b <- ur
```

Now we've got 

```{r}
ur <- b
ur$np_MutualRepl <- F
ur$np_Hypercycle <- F
ur$np_Parasitic <- F

mur <- ur[ur$pp_Replicator,]

xur <- mur[mur$actseq %in% mur$passeq,]
xur <- xur[xur$passeq %in% xur$actseq,]

```
